headline.main: Fed's Brainard, Citing Improved Global Economy, Says Rates Can Rise 'Soon'
headline.print_headline: Fed's Brainard, Citing Improved Global Economy, Says Rates Can Rise 'Soon'

docs.lead_paragraph: An improving global economy and a solid U.S. recovery mean it will be "appropriate soon" for the Federal Reserve to raise U.S.  interest rates Fed Governor Lael Brainard said on Wednesday, adding an important voice to the chorus of officials signalling rates may rise as soon as mid-March.

headline.main: School Board in Key Transgender Case Seeks U.S. High Court Delay
headline.print_headline: School Board in Key Transgender Case Seeks U.S. High Court Delay

docs.lead_paragraph: The Virginia school board sued by a student over bathroom access in a major transgender rights case asked the U.S. Supreme Court on Wednesday to delay the matter until at least April, when President Donald Trump's conservative nominee could be on the bench and potentially cast the deciding vote.
